entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch doesn't launch browser correctly if the listening URL has a trailing slash #36709
  • [Bug]: getItem/getProperty output can contain unrelated junk #36694

Closed

  • New/Empty Blazor Server Project from template doesn't compile (.Net 6 preview 7) #19652
  • net 6.0 throws NETSDK1005 error during build/publish via cmd as it does not accept the property "TargetFramework(s)" #19628
  • BlazorAOT workload installation not working #19798
  • Unable to find a stable package Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Authoring.Tasks with version (>= 8.0.100) #36659

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #36718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #36717
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36716
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #36715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #36714
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #36713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2309986 #36712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump dockercredsprovider to pick up a bugfix #36707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36676
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE, 8.0.2

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.101 #36706
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.405 #36705
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.312 #36704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.115 #36703
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.418 #36702
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.321 #36701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.126 #36700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler (#35939) #36670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove old System.CommandLine code that has a more natural expression #36672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Change the format of tool exceptions and NuGet API exceptions to be graceful #36641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add option to ignore baseline TFMs #36669
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Switch back to the RC2 build since GA has gone internal. #36578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36584
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [Issue #35173] WIP: `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
